item.title: Why I Need a Home Server
item.description: Introduction I build a pretty small home server with ubuntu os. The mainly usage are self hobby development and entertainment. Writing It’s more easy to writing every where. I build a website with Hugo and Github pages. Then I set the set workspace on my linux server. At the same time, I build a visual code server. I could access this code server anywhere. The coder server will save the status of editing.

item.title: Build homepage on Github pages with Hugo Framework
item.description: Instruction Here is how to setup a homepage hosted in the Github pages with Hugo. Install Hugo Please follow this link to install Hugo. My platform is Ubuntu and I use the following command line installing Hugo sudo snap install hugo Create the static website Use the hugo command to create your static website. hugo new site homepage --format yaml Run the below command to have a test locally. hugo server Run the following command line to generate the static file
